name: Snowflake Workspace
description: Import Snowflake tasks, stored procedures, dynamic tables, materialized views, streams, Snowpipes, stages, external tables, alerts, and OpenFlow flows as Dagster assets. Comprehensive orchestration and observation for your entire Snowflake workspace.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each discovered Snowflake entity

warehouse.label: Warehouse
warehouse.description: Snowflake warehouse to use for queries

import_tasks.label: Import Tasks
import_tasks.description: Import Snowflake tasks as materializable assets

import_stored_procedures.label: Import Stored Procedures
import_stored_procedures.description: Import stored procedures as materializable assets

import_dynamic_tables.label: Import Dynamic Tables
import_dynamic_tables.description: Import dynamic tables as materializable assets (trigger manual refreshes)

import_snowpipes.label: Import Snowpipes
import_snowpipes.description: Import Snowpipe continuous ingestion pipes as materializable assets (trigger refresh)

import_stages.label: Import Stages
import_stages.description: Import internal and external stages as observable assets (monitor files)

import_materialized_views.label: Import Materialized Views
import_materialized_views.description: Import materialized views as materializable assets (trigger refresh via SUSPEND/RESUME)

import_external_tables.label: Import External Tables
import_external_tables.description: Import external tables as materializable assets (refresh metadata from external sources)

import_alerts.label: Import Alerts
import_alerts.description: Import Snowflake alerts as observable assets (monitor alert history and status)

import_openflow_flows.label: Import OpenFlow Flows
import_openflow_flows.description: Import OpenFlow data integration flows as observable assets (monitor via telemetry)

filter_by_name_pattern.label: Filter by Name Pattern
filter_by_name_pattern.description: Regex pattern to filter entities by name (e.g., '^PROD_' for names starting with 'PROD_')

exclude_name_pattern.label: Exclude Name Pattern
exclude_name_pattern.description: Regex pattern to exclude entities by name (e.g., 'TEST|DEV' to exclude test and dev entities)

task_filter_by_state.label: Task State Filter
task_filter_by_state.description: Filter tasks by state (STARTED, SUSPENDED). Leave empty to import all tasks.

poll_interval_seconds.label: Sensor Poll Interval
poll_interval_seconds.description: How often (in seconds) the sensor should check for completed runs

generate_sensor.label: Generate Observation Sensor
generate_sensor.description: Create a sensor to observe task runs, dynamic table refreshes, and Snowpipe loads

group_name.label: Asset Group
group_name.description: Group name for all imported assets

description.label: Description
description.description: Description for the Snowflake workspace component
